title: WTB/WTTF: American Beauty 460- Hughie Jennings (Two Hands/ Dancing!)

posts.post_title: WTB/WTTF: American Beauty 460- Hughie Jennings (Two Hands/ Dancing!)
posts.post_content:
Hi.

I would like to buy or possibly trade for a T206 American Beauty 460 of Hughie Jennings (Two Hands/ Dancing shot).

I do not necessarily care about the grade, but I prefer one that is pleasant on the eyes and does not have any major flaws (massive crease, heavy staining, destructive paper loss etc. etc. etc.).

If you have one of these and would consider parting with it, please feel free to shoot me a PM and I would love to discuss a potential deal.

Thank You Very Much.

Derek

Hi. I wanted to bump this thread again. I am very interested in landing this particular front/ back combo. I have cash, as well as other T206 to trade if anyone is willing to part with theirs.
